snippet: Groups of students from the Tanztheater Wuppertal and Juilliard are performing “Wind von West,” offering a rare glimpse of Pina Bausch’s early career.
lead_paragraph: Groups of students from the Tanztheater Wuppertal and Juilliard are performing “Wind von West,” offering a rare glimpse of Pina Bausch’s early career.

headline.main: A Bausch Rarity Set to Stravinsky
headline.print_headline: A Bausch Rarity Set to Stravinsky
